articles.description: Sony has unveiled two new wireless speakers that can work with Google Home or Amazon Alexa. The speakers are capable of producing spatial 3D sound and the larger model is Hi-Res certified.
articles.content:
The new SRS-RA3000 is the ideal bedtime companion and looks smart in its black finish with copper ... [+] accents.
Sony

articles.title: HP unveils Snapdragon 8cx Elite Folio convertible laptop - Phone Mantra
articles.description: HP unveiled the Elite Folio business laptop in conjunction with the all-digital CES 2021 Consumer Electronics Show this year.
